name: You Can't Compete With Mushroom Man
name_original: You Can't Compete With Mushroom Man
description:
A platformer-esque Bitsy story I created for the Mushroom Jam. It's a little janky because you have to make the gravity go by pressing down yourself.

This game is a metaphor for something. If you're a developer - or any creative type to be honest - you'll probably get it.
